case.title: Guy in uniform looking for bbw - 28
case.text: I've always been very attracted to bbws. I have yet to see a bbw I haven't found attractive. I'm looking for a bbw to meet up and have some fun with. I can bring the uniform and handcuffs if you want. Age, race, etc are not issues for me either. I am dd free, play safe, and I am looking for the same.
